meanings.definition: An example that serves to illustrate a point.
meanings.sent1: In science class, the teacher used various instancies to explain different concepts.
meanings.sent2: She provided instancies of successful projects to inspire the students.
meanings.sent3: The instancies of animals wearing clothes in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to charity work was an instancy of kindness that touched many hearts.
meanings.sent5: The instancies of teamwork in the sports competition were truly impressive.

meanings.definition: A request or petition for something to be done.
meanings.sent1: The instancies for additional funding were submitted to the board last week.
meanings.sent2: He made several instancies for a new playground in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The instancies for more ice cream at the party were met with cheers.
meanings.sent4: Her instancy for a later curfew was denied by her parents.
meanings.sent5: The instancies for better safety measures at the construction site were finally implemented.
